Smitten Vorbos:
I remember her when the wind picks up.
I remember her when I look at the clouds.
I am reminded of her when I see the sun.
I will never return to the Camp of Orcs! My relatives are now hateful to me. I miss her... I Want to see her. My heart is beating like crazy. But... the Orcs do not give rest to my sweet, nor her friends.
